original_text:
It is just as Isaiah said previously:
“Unless the Lord Almighty
    had left us descendants,
we would have become like Sodom,
    we would have been like Gomorrah.”
korean_text: 또한 이사야가 미리 말한 바 만일 만군의 주께서 우리에게 씨를 남겨 두지 아니하셨더라면 우리가 소돔과 같이 되고 고모라와 같았으리로다 함과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: It is just as Isaiah said previously
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 이사야가 이전에 말한 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: Unless Lord Almighty had left us descendants
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 전능하신 주께서 우리에게 자손을 남겨두지 않으셨다면

sentences.original_text: we would have become like Sodom
we would have been like Gomorrah
